Body:
B = calculateBMatrix(cell)
R1 = np.array(r1[:3])
R2 = np.array(r2[:3])
h1 = np.dot(B, R1)
h2 = np.dot(B, R2)
HT = matFromTwoVectors(h1, h2)
u1 = calcTasUVectorFromAngles(r1)
u2 = calcTasUVectorFromAngles(r2)
UT = matFromTwoVectors(u1, u2)
HTT = HT.T
U = np.dot(UT, HTT)
UB = np.dot(U, B)
return UB
